backend/main.mo: Stores contact messages in a growable array and provides methods to submit and retrieve them.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two environment updates and their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of multiple frontend files describing UI panels, hooks, 3D scene components, and interaction systems.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment guide outlining backend, frontend, and runtime steps along with diagnostic output format.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point linking to the root element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/public/elementor/README-element: Instructions for embedding the static 3D cafe build into WordPress via Elementor, including capabilities and limitations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app initializing theme, 3D scene, top nav, overlay panels, and startup error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContourFr: Container component rendering children inside a styled contour-textured frame.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelSurf: Generic panel layout with title bar, close button, scrollable content, and contour frame styling.
frontend/src/components/nav/HelpButton.t: Floating help button with tooltip that triggers the onboarding or help overlay.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo and buttons to open About, Contact, and Menu panels.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Deploym: Overlay component showing a startup error summary with expandable technical details and copy‑to‑clipboard diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Onboard: Dialog-based onboarding overlay explaining movement and interaction controls with tips for navigating the 3D cafe.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithErrorHand: Enhanced actor hook that adds error tracking, logs diagnostics, and supports manual retries on actor initialization failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppViewport.ts: Hook that updates a CSS variable with the visual viewport height to stabilize layouts on mobile browsers.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstVisitFlag.ts: Hook managing a localStorage-backed flag to determine and update whether the user is visiting for the first time.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, storing identities, and exposing login/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and submitting contact messages using the backend actor with diagnostics, validation, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables for light/dark themes, typography, viewport behavior, and safe‑area utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPanel.tsx: Implements a slide‑in About panel describing the cafe with icons, sections, and scrollable content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: Provides a contact form panel with validation, backend submission via queries, and contact info display.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: Shows a panel for downloading a static WordPress package with instructions and feature notes.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: Renders a tabbed menu panel for coffee, pastries, and desserts, with navigation to other panels.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Defines the 3D cafe scene with lights, a basic fallback room, navigation hooks, and render‑ready/error callbacks.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeCharac: Stub aggregator that returns null so no characters are added to the scene.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeDogs.t: Places two static DogCharacter instances in fixed positions within the cafe scene.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeHumans: Places three static HumanCharacter instances with fixed positions, rotations, and color settings.
frontend/src/scene/characters/characterM: Provides shared material hooks and predefined color palettes for skin, clothing, and fur to reduce allocations.
frontend/src/scene/characters/DogCharact: Defines a static low-poly dog model built from simple primitives with shared materials and no animations.
frontend/src/scene/characters/HumanChara: Defines a static low-poly human model using shared materials, supporting seated or standing poses.
frontend/src/scene/components/MenuBoardF: Creates a glowing emissive frame outline using shape geometry for neon-style rectangular borders.
frontend/src/scene/components/WallFrameL: Generates a high‑resolution canvas texture to render crisp 3D text labels on a plane with minimal z‑fighting.
frontend/src/scene/controls/useCafeNavig: Provides camera navigation with keyboard controls, pointer lock rotation, and touch-friendly drag-to-look behavior. Manages input events and updates camera orientation and movement each frame.
frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafe: Renders a lightweight fallback café room with walls, floor, contour overlays, and basic furniture including counter, espresso machine, and tables. Designed to show reliable geometry without dependencies or suspense.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvir: Builds the full café environment including physics floor, textured walls, ceiling contour overlays, and arranged furniture. Signals successful mount and applies contour textures to surfaces.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeFurni: Defines reusable 3D furniture components such as counter, table, and wooden chair with contour-textured beige surfaces. Each component constructs its geometry and materials for café scene placement.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds espresso machine, grinder, pastry case, and a neon-glow menu board with large label text to the café environment. Applies beige contour textures and preserves glass/metal materials where appropriate.
frontend/src/scene/environment/Commercia: Renders a detailed commercial espresso machine model using multiple meshes and groups. Supports positioning and optional contour texture.
frontend/src/scene/HomeCafeCanvas.tsx: Sets up the main Three.js canvas with loading/error handling, WebGL checks, and responsive camera settings, mounting the CafeScene inside an error boundary.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useContourTextu: Loads a contour texture and creates floor, wall, and furniture variants with repeat and filtering settings.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useNonBlockingT: Non-blocking texture loader hook that logs success or failure and returns a loaded texture or undefined.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useSceneStartup: Watchdog hook that triggers a timeout callback if a scene fails to render within a set duration.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useWallMapTextu: Loads and configures a repeating wall-map texture with filtering and anisotropy settings.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/DoorCont: Automatically opens and closes a door mesh based on camera proximity using smooth rotation.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Provides a draggable inspectable prop that rotates during inspection and shows an on-screen hint.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Interact: Empty placeholder file for interaction management.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Renders interactive floating props (card, cup, sign) with hover/press feedback and labels.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Displays rotating, interactive POI markers with hover, dwell detection, and activation callbacks.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Defines the list of POIs with IDs, labels, positions, actions, and optional highlight colors.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Defines proximity-triggered UI zones that activate when the camera enters specific areas.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/ScenePan: Empty placeholder file for panel-related scene props.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Defines helper functions to create various Three.js materials and exports a contour color palette.
frontend/src/scene/SceneErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that captures scene render errors, increments a counter, and resets when a retry key changes.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneDegradedOverl: Displays a UI overlay warning when the café details fail to load and provides a retry button.
Renders an error overlay for scene load failures with optional technical diagnostics and a retry action.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneLoadingOverla: Shows a loading overlay for the scene and switches to a degraded warning state after a timeout.
frontend/src/scene/utils/sceneDiagnostic: Provides types and functions for logging, formatting, and reporting scene loading diagnostics.
frontend/src/scene/utils/webglSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL support and required extensions, returning diagnostic information.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Zustand store managing which UI overlay panel is currently active.
frontend/src/theme/motion.ts: Defines motion easing, durations, spring configs, and a helper for building CSS transitions.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Exports design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and radii.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Provides utilities for logging deployment errors with context and remediation hints.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, requests, and metadata for the 3D Cafe project.
